title: No Cook Cranberry Salad
directions: Combine cranberry sauce, grapes, mandarin oranges, coconut, vanilla, walnuts, and apple in a bowl. Allow to set for 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can whole cranberry sauce (such as Ocean Spray)
1/4 (11 ounce) can mandarin oranges, drained and quartered
